          <title>
            <string language="sl">Prenos toplote, sevanje</string>
            <string language="en">Heat Transfer, Radiation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung, Strahlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert Thermique, Rayonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência De Calor, Radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio di calore, Radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά θερμότητας, ακτινοβολία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traspaso térmico, Radiación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sevanje sonca in vpliv na temperaturo planeta glede na oddaljenost.</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation of sun and its effect on planet's temperature depending on a planet's distance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sevanje</string>
            <string language="en">radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplota</string>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung der Sonne und sein Effekt auf 
Temperatur des Planeten abhängig von dem Abstand eines Planeten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnement du soleil et son effet sur la 
température de la planète selon la distance d'une planète.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação do sol e seu efeito na temperatura do 
planeta dependendo da distância de um planeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione del sole ed il relativo effetto sulla 
temperatura del pianeta secondo la distanza del pianeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακτινοβολία του ήλιου και της επίδρασής του στη 
θερμοκρασία του πλανήτη ανάλογα με την απόσταση ενός πλανήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación del sol y su efecto sobre la 
temperatura del planeta dependiendo de la distancia de un planeta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
